constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 14 (Monday, January 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GONZALEZ of Ohio:
H.R. 467.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 Clause 18: To Make all Laws which shall
be necessary and proper for carrying into execution the
foregoing powers, and all other powers vested by this
Constitution in the Government of the United States.
[Page H233]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Protecting Patient Access to Lifesaving COVID–19 Drugs Act of 2021
